actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Tuskegee Institute National Historical Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of the Tuskegee Institute National Historical Park in Tuskegee, Alabama. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Tuskegee Institute National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
